Judul: DETEKSI PANJANG DAN ORIENTASI RETAK PADA KOMPOSIT POLIMER SERAT KARBON ANYAMAN MENGGUNAKAN METODE PERUBAHAN RESISTANSI ELEKTRIK
Abstrak:
Carbon Fiber Reinforced Polymer (CFRP) is becoming increasingly ubiquitous,
especially in aerospace applications. Dire consequences of this material failure in said
application motivates research in finding ways to detect structural damage. One of the
methods is electrical resistance change method (ERC Method). Structural damage yields
higher resistance when measured. This method can be employed in the development of
structural health monitoring (SHM) system in an effort to increase structural reliability.
This research aims to use ERC method to identify crack length and orientation in
CFRP plate. Firstly experimental and simulation model of a CFRP specimen is compared to
obtain a representative model. Next, using the same conductivity property, a plate model is
built with various crack length and orientation to obtain resistance value. A surface of
resistance as function of crack length and orientation can then be built using surface fitting.
Finally a program to predict crack length and orientation is developed.
Bulk specimen model proves to be capable of approximating experimental
measurement accurately. Resistance surface can be built using a certain toolbox from
MATLAB. Program can be developed using the same software.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Dr. Ir. Ignatius Pulung Nurprasetio, MSME
Kata Kunci: CFRP, resistance, conductivity, crack, length, orientation, surface fitting
